welcomeDescription: Our e-learning portal provides a comprehensive platform for managing and accessing your educational content. Explore the various features and tools to enhance your learning experience.
notesDescription: Create and view your notes, organize them efficiently, and access them anytime.
apiTokensDescription: Manage your API tokens to integrate with external services and tools.
localizationDescription: Switch between English and French to use the platform in your preferred language.
authenticationDescription: Securely login and register to access all the features of the e-learning portal, with support for password recovery and email verification.
